reviewText:
Patti Davis Celebrity Centerfold is by far big and large the biggest and most important
Celeb Playboy ever landed during there strongest years
Do to her family and who she was

Just on a pop culture aspect a former Presidnet's daughter pose nude for a worldwide publication is massive
But, let's all be honest HUSTLER Magazine threw down the gauntlet years prior with
Publishing paparazzi pics of Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis
but, PB did manage to pull this off and much like Layoya Jackson doing playboy
Patti Davis doing the magazine/video was a massive big deal at the time
She was in hot water with her father for doing it
It's a very daring and raw centerfold video
In 2015 it might seems tame but, this i doubt will ever happen again
This was no PR angle it wasn't a so-called leaked video this was Legit
and i honestly doubt she did it for the pay day
She did it to break-free and liberate herself
the video is a look back at a different time Pop-Culture wise
Patti Davis is a very interesting woman to say the least

This is one of the very few official Playboy home video releases on dvd that's still super cheap
If you can get this while you can once it's out of print (It'll sky rocket in value and the asking price will be over priced x6)
So snatch it up while it's still at a reasonable SRP  9.5/10
This gal has some of the best nipples that ever walked the earth.

This is crap ! These kinds of films should not be legal to sell . Guys should not even watch these films whether they are married or single . It will steal your heart in a bad way ! These films are not intended to help you ,but to damage your emotions and your soul . This is another satanic trap !
I happen to like what playboy did in the 1990's-that is, get celebrities to "show off" their stuff and filming video about them.  This is one of those videos and I like it.

YOU BUY THIS FOR PATTI DAVIS, WHO CARES OR SHOULD CARE TO WATCH ANYTHING BUT PATTI DAVIS ON THIS DVD, SHE'S INCREDIBLE AND SHE IS ENOUGH TO WATCH ON THIS DVD. I LIKE THE FACT THAT PATTI WENT FULL FRONTAL AND NO AFRAID TO ENJOY SHOWING HOW BEAUTIFUL SHE IS, WOW!

Playboy - Patti Davis Celebrity Centerfold is fifty minutes and was released on April 30, 2002. As for as celebrities goes, non-Playmates, she is the most liberated of them all. I have own LaToya Jackson, Jessica Hahn, and a few others and you had to wait for the nudity or there was very little nudity. In her opening scene she is emerging from the lake nude. With the exception of the Power Plant segment, she is fully nude in all other segments. Basically Patti talks a little bit about herself, growing up as a Reagan, and her take on feminism. The only downside to the video is the Playmate Profile on Victoria Zdrok (Playboy Playmate of the Month for October 1994, Penthouse Pet of the Month June 2002, and Penthouse Pet of the Year 2004); she shows very little nudity as compared to Patti who is fully nude in most of her segments. Below are segments of Patti and Victoria.

Patti
Power Plant-Does a slow striptease; her underwear stays on. This segment goes for an artistic scenario.
Sculpted Bodies-She is 100 percent nude from start to finish of the segment.
Romantic Beach-Patti starts off topless only wearing a lei and skirt. After about thirty seconds later the skirt is gone and she is nude.
Angel-About thirty seconds into the segment she is totally nude.
Kick Boxing-The segment switches back and forth from her kick boxing workout to scenes of her in the nude.
Near Future-Starts off dressed in black. Patti along with another guy and female have a three-way.

Victoria
Library-She strip in the library, but not one scene shows her in the nude.
Vargas-Very, very, very little nudity and boring.
Zarina-Full nudity for about 15% of the segment.

If you got rid the Victoria Zdrok part of the DVD then this would be a great video. Playboy - Patti Davis Celebrity Centerfold gets an AAA+++.

DVD FEATURES

2. Family Pictures

4. Sculpted Bodies

1. Behind-The Scenes
2. Preview: Celebrity Centerfold Dian Parkerson
3. Preview: The Best of Pamela Anderson
4. Preview: Playboy Celebrities
5. Preview: The Complete Anna Nicole Smith

I have owned/viewed all of the Playboy Celebrity Centerfold videos and I firmly believe Patti Davis has the best one of all.

She shows the most confidence of all the other celebs. Her tricep tone, flat abs and understated make-up; even though she isn't amply endowed, her pert nips add to my 4-Star rating. I would have given the video a 5 but I thought the editting, for that matter, the editting on the others wasn't any better. Playboy must hire new-be editors or underpay their experienced ones.
